Bounty grinned, satisfied that these bots were tougher than the paper 
mache he'd given them credit for. "Bring it on birdie", he said as he 
continued his hopping to avoid the incoming fire. Metallic feathers 
spread out on all sides of his body aiming in all directions. "Dizzy 
Spin" he yelled as his body began spinning at a fast rate of speed 
firing blasters in all directions. 

(At least let me destroy a bat probe, I can't let him be turned into 
leftovers without a decent fight.)

-- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...>
